doc.after: The atmosphere of Earth is a layer of gases surrounding the planet Earth that is retained by Earth s gravity The atmosphere protects life on Earth by absorbing ultraviolet solar radiation warming the surface through heat retention greenhouse effect and reducing temperature extremes between day and night the diurnal temperature variation
